Hero.title: Gimme is a Commission-Free Order & Pay Solution
Hero.subline: Use Gimme to better serve, connect with and reward your guests. Get your unique mobile app and web ordering app for the hospitality industry.

Quote.title: Save on fees with our restaurant solution without high app commissions like Eat.
Quote.subline: Achieve top Google search rankings as we optimize your SEO restaurant page making it easier to attract more views, guests, and profits.
Quote.cardTitle: Set Up Your Online Delivery For Your Restaurant Now
Quote.cardSubline: Our service streamlines the online delivery for restaurants creation process, making it effortless for individuals to set up online delivery, takeaway, dine-in service, or digital menu with just a few clicks. With our user-friendly platform and intuitive interface, you can easily configure and launch your service, ensuring a seamless experience for your customers. No complex setup required!

Grid.title: Get Gimme to Get All Solutions For Your Digital Growth
Grid.goal: Our goal is to simplify the daily life of restaurant owners and increase profits.
Grid.feature1Title: Order and Pay Directly in Restaurant
Grid.feature1Description: Maximize ordering potential and make it easy for your customers to get exactly what they want.
Grid.feature5Description: By integrating with your website, you can serve your customers through your own delivery platform, saving on third-party fees and retaining control over your quality.
Grid.feature4Description: Customize your restaurant's ordering page to your preferences, allow customers to pre-order for their preferred pickup time and make payments.
Grid.feature6Description: A loyalty program that generates 3x more across its lifetime, turning guests into brand loyalists.
Grid.feature2Description: Get your own restaurant and Instagram page completely tailored for your needs.
Grid.feature3Description: Make it easy for your guests to quickly scan the QR code and instantly view our diverse menu for additional ordering inspiration

Restaurants.title: Tailored for Restaurants, Bars, Hotels, retail stores and much more
Restaurants.subline: Streamline operations: manage your digital menu, take-away, delivery, and access clear daily and monthly statements from one place

BrandGuestExperience.title: A Brand Guest Experience That Converts
BrandGuestExperience.subline: Customization is key, and at Gimme, we understand the personal touch. Create an app that resonates with your brand's voice, colors, and imagery, making every tap, swipe, and scroll uniquely yours

RestaurantLoyaltySoftware.title: Enhance Guest Loyalty with Our Restaurant Loyalty Software
RestaurantLoyaltySoftware.subline: More than 75% of your future business comes from repeat guests. Gimme helps you discover more of them through a personalized loyalty program that cultivates a devoted following. Provide your guests with incentives to make frequent purchases.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subline: Learn how to set up your digital presence for your restaurant online for FREE in 60 seconds!
FAQ.FAQ1Title: How can Gimme help with staff shortage due to seasonality in the mountains
FAQ.FAQ1Subline: If peak times are overwhelming your staff, Yoordi, our integrated tool, can assist you in simplifying your daily operations. Yoordi efficiently serves and settles all tables for you simultaneously, providing relief during busy seasons.
FAQ.FAQ2Title: Can you provide some insights into revenue growth with Gimme?
FAQ.FAQ2Subline: Yes, Gimme customers have seen an average of 42% monthly revenue growth, demonstrating the positive impact of our services on businesses.
FAQ.FAQ3Title: What is order throttling, and how does it benefit businesses?
FAQ.FAQ3Subline: Order throttling is a crucial feature that prevents locations from experiencing a backlog of orders, ensuring a smooth customer service experience. It helps avoid issues like orders not being ready, long lines, and parking problems, providing a better overall experience for both the restaurant and its customers.
FAQ.FAQ4Subline: We would love to be a part of your vision and collaborate with you to create a custom solution for your unique business idea.
FAQ.FAQ5Title: What is an online ordering system for restaurants, and why is it essential?
FAQ.FAQ5Subline: An online ordering system allows customers to place orders without being physically present at the restaurant. It's a vital tool as customers increasingly expect the convenience of ordering online, and not offering this option can result in losing potential customers to competitors.
FAQ.FAQ6Title: What software do restaurants use to take orders?
FAQ.FAQ6Subline: Restaurants use Gimme to design beautiful ordering apps and websites, which seamlessly transmit online orders directly to their Point of Sale (POS) system.
FAQ.FAQ7Title: What types of online ordering systems are available?
FAQ.FAQ7Subline: Gimme caters to small to medium-sized restaurants looking to initiate online orders. We aggregate orders from various touchpoints, including websites, apps, kiosks, and third-party marketplace apps.
FAQ.FAQ8Subline: Yes, Gimme provides comprehensive delivery management that allows you to set delivery rules, making it suitable for businesses that offer delivery services to their customers.
FAQ.FAQ9Title: How can Loyalty Base Programs benefit my restaurant?
FAQ.FAQ9Subline: Loyalty Base Programs, such as 'Spend X to get Y,' enable you to create a custom loyalty program that encourages repeat business and grows your customer following. These programs can include bonuses like double points days or wallet drops to keep your guests engaged.
FAQ.FAQ10Title: Can I customize my ordering app with Gimme?
FAQ.FAQ10Subline: Absolutely. Ordering is personal, and so are our customizations. You can build an app that aligns with your brand's voice, colors, and imagery, ensuring a unique and consistent customer experience.
FAQ.FAQ11Title: What can I expect from the online ordering experience with Gimme?
FAQ.FAQ11Subline: Gimme offers a seamless online ordering experience designed to keep guests checking out with zero issues, ensuring a smooth and efficient process for both the business and the customer.
